channel.title: For all of you who want a command log

item.title: For all of you who want a command log
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“Runer King, post:1, topic:171901”]Ruin-Scape’s Command Log!

I am finally releasing a command log that is easy to add.

Add this after your first command.

BufferedWriter bww = null; try { bww = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("commandlog.txt", true)); bww.write(playerName+" uses ::"+command); bww.newLine(); bww.newLine(); bww.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bww != null) try { bww.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { } }

Then make a text file called commandlog.

If you find any errors, or have problems, let me know, I will help!

REPLY WITH FEEDBACK PLEASE!

Enjoy this easy Command Log![/quote]wrong section go to tutorials section

Read full topic
item.source: For all of you who want a command log

@Runer_King wrote:

Ruin-Scape’s Command Log!

I am finally releasing a command log that is easy to add.

Add this after your first command.

BufferedWriter bww = null; try { bww = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("commandlog.txt", true)); bww.write(playerName+" uses ::"+command); bww.newLine(); bww.newLine(); bww.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bww != null) try { bww.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { } }
